title: Fix duplicate/repeating lines in Android terminal during live streaming
description: When Claude Code is live streaming its output/feedback in the Android terminal, lines are being duplicated or repeated. This creates a confusing and cluttered display. Need to investigate the streaming buffer/rendering logic to prevent duplicate line output.

title: Add scrollbar to Android terminal and rename new thread button
description: 1. Add a visible scrollbar to the terminal view in Android app for better navigation of output. 2. Rename 'START A NEW THREAD' button to 'Start a new terminal session' for clarity. 3. Ensure folder selection still works properly with these changes.

title: Implement GitHub webhook endpoint with HMAC validation
description: POST /webhooks/github - receive workflow_run events, validate signature, store deployment

title: Add CTRL+Q button to Android terminal keyboard
description: Add a dedicated CTRL+Q button to the Android app terminal keyboard. This key combo allows switching to agent-deck but isn't accessible on standard Android keyboards. Should be added to the custom keyboard row/toolbar in the terminal view.

title: Implement SSE endpoint for real-time updates
description: GET /events - stream status updates to frontend clients

title: Reorder Claude sessions menu - Resume above Start new
Fix terminal scroll in tmux - enable scroll up for history
Add Cloudflare API polling service
description: Poll Cloudflare Pages API every 1 min for deployment status

title: Show Android app threads in session resume list
description: Session resume currently only shows threads from Windows/PC. It should also include threads that were started from the Android app itself.

title: Update ci-monitor frontend to use SSE
description: Replace invalidateAll() polling with EventSource subscription

title: Fix infrastructure display - static metadata, dynamic status
Add Fly.io GraphQL polling service
description: Poll Fly.io API every 1 min for app status, machine health, deployments

title: Fix START A NEW THREAD button in Android app
description: The 'START A NEW THREAD' button in the Android app currently does nothing. It should work the same as starting a new session from the Android new session screen.

title: Implement alert system with email support
description: Per-project alerts: UI-only for hobby, email for business projects
